verses.roman:
pūrve yei dekhāñāchi dig-daraśana
taiche jāniha 'vikāra' 'pralāpa' varṇana

synonyms: pūrve—previously; yei—as; dekhāñāchi—I have shown; dik-daraśana—only an indication; taiche—similarly; jāniha—you may know; vikāra—transformations; pralāpa—crazy talks; varṇana—description.
translation: As I have previously indicated, I am describing the mad speeches and bodily transformations of the Lord only in brief.
